अ.name: A
अ.description: Represents the default vowel sound in Hindi, used in many words.

आ.name: Ā
आ.description: Used to denote a long 'a' sound, similar to 'a' in 'father'.

इ.name: I
इ.description: Represents a short 'i' sound, similar to 'i' in 'bit'.

ई.name: Ī
ई.description: Denotes a long 'ee' sound, like 'ee' in 'see'.

उ.name: U
उ.description: Represents a short 'u' sound, similar to 'u' in 'put'.

ऊ.name: Ū
ऊ.description: Used for a long 'oo' sound, like 'oo' in 'boot'.

ए.name: E
ए.description: Represents an 'e' sound, similar to 'e' in 'they'.

ओ.name: O
ओ.description: Represents an 'o' sound, similar to 'o' in 'go'.

औ.name: Au
औ.description: Used for the 'au' sound, like 'ow' in 'how'.

क.name: Ka
क.description: Represents the 'k' sound, similar to 'k' in 'kite'.

ग.name: Ga
ग.description: Represents the 'g' sound, similar to 'g' in 'go'.

घ.name: Gha
घ.description: An aspirated 'g' sound, with a breathy voice.

च.name: Ca
च.description: Represents the 'ch' sound, similar to 'ch' in 'church'.

छ.name: Cha
छ.description: An aspirated 'ch' sound, with a breathy release.

ज.name: Ja
ज.description: Represents the 'j' sound, similar to 'j' in 'jam'.

झ.name: Jha
झ.description: An aspirated 'j' sound, with a breathy voice.

ञ.name: Nya
ञ.description: Represents the 'ny' sound, similar to 'ny' in 'canyon'.

ट.name: Ta
ट.description: Represents a retroflex 't' sound, unique to Indian languages.

ठ.name: Tha
ठ.description: An aspirated retroflex 't' sound, with a breathy release.

ड.name: Da
ड.description: Represents a retroflex 'd' sound, unique to Indian languages.

ढ.name: Dha
ढ.description: An aspirated retroflex 'd' sound, with a breathy voice.

ण.name: Na
ण.description: Represents a retroflex 'n' sound, unique to Indian languages.

त.name: Ta
त.description: Represents a dental 't' sound, articulated with the tongue at the teeth.

थ.name: Tha
थ.description: An aspirated dental 't' sound, with a breathy release.

द.name: Da
द.description: Represents a dental 'd' sound, articulated with the tongue at the teeth.

ध.name: Dha
ध.description: An aspirated dental 'd' sound, with a breathy voice.

न.name: Na
न.description: Represents the 'n' sound, similar to 'n' in 'net'.

प.name: Pa
प.description: Represents the 'p' sound, similar to 'p' in 'pat'.

फ.name: Pha
फ.description: An aspirated 'p' sound, with a breathy release.

ब.name: Ba
ब.description: Represents the 'b' sound, similar to 'b' in 'bat'.

भ.name: Bha
भ.description: An aspirated 'b' sound, with a breathy voice.

म.name: Ma
म.description: Represents the 'm' sound, similar to 'm' in 'man'.

य.name: Ya
य.description: Represents the 'y' sound, similar to 'y' in 'yes'.

र.name: Ra
र.description: Represents a flapped 'r' sound, similar to Spanish 'r'.

ल.name: La
ल.description: Represents the 'l' sound, similar to 'l' in 'lamp'.

व.name: Va
व.description: Represents a sound between 'v' and 'w', unique to Hindi.

श.name: Sha
श.description: Represents the 'sh' sound, similar to 'sh' in 'shoe'.

ष.name: Ṣa
ष.description: Represents a retroflex 'sh' sound, unique to Indian languages.

स.name: Sa
स.description: Represents the 's' sound, similar to 's' in 'sun'.

ह.name: Ha
ह.description: Represents the 'h' sound, similar to 'h' in 'hat'.

क्ष.name: Kṣa
क्ष.description: Represents a complex 'ksh' sound, unique to Sanskrit and Hindi.

त्र.name: Tra
त्र.description: Represents a 'tr' cluster, used in many Hindi words.

ज्ञ.name: Gya
ज्ञ.description: Represents a 'gy' cluster, used in Sanskrit-derived words.
